document_data.caption: A map showing Wheel Hall (labeled #42) on River Street.
document_data.name: Wheel Hall
document_data.mainbody: '''Wheel Hall''' was the guildhall of the [[Guilds of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian guild]] known as the [[Weelwrights' Guild]].<ref>
document_data.Location: Wheel Hall was located along [[River Street]], in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Reputation: Like other guildhalls in the Trades Ward, Wheel Hall was considered by locals to be a landmark.
